item.description: 据报道，当局可能准备收回萨哈林 2 号项目股权被征用后授予超级巨头的 10 亿美元。【原文：Authorities may be preparing to take back $1 billion awarded to supermajor following expropriation of stake Sakhalin 2, according to reports】
